response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a swift transaction. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
